channel.title: Ant on YoSQL
channel.description: Recent content in Ant on YoSQL

item.title: Ant
item.description: In order to use the YoSQL tooling for Ant, follow these steps: Download the yosql-tooling-ant task zip file from the latest release (or any prior version). Define a task in your build.xml. The lib folder of the yosql-tooling-ant zip file contains all jar files that are required for the task. Write .sql files in a directory of your choice (e.g. /path/to/your/sql/files). Adjust the configuration of the YoSQL task. Execute the YoSQL task in order to generate Java code.
